titles.title: To waive the period of Congressional review of the Child in Need of Protection Amendment Act of 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Davis (VA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5537.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/25/2000--Introduced. Waives the congressional review period for the Child in Need of Protection Amendment Act of 2000 (passed by the District of Columbia City Council). Declares that such Act shall take effect on the date of its enactment or the date of enactment of this Act, whichever is later.
